dataList.name: Strider [Mao]
dataList.desc: When attacking targets with slower Speed than this unit's, inflict +1 more [Burst] or [Burst] Count and deal +10% damage

dataList.name: Vigor [Mao]
dataList.desc: On Hit against enemy with [BurstAgility]: inflict +2 [Burst] Count on the target (6 times per turn)

dataList.name: Dominator [Mao]
dataList.desc: On Skill Use, if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 2 or more, Coin Power +1

dataList.name: The Big Brother
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies, including this unit, heal 10 SP
Take -20% damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], [Sinking]

dataList.name: Vengeance Tattoo
dataList.desc: Every time a Middle ally is killed in this encounter, gain 1 [AttackUp] (max 5)

dataList.name: Deeper in the World of Bristly
dataList.desc: If this unit loses 2 Clashes, gain 6 [DefenseDown] next turn

dataList.name: The Book of Vengeance
dataList.desc:
When this unit or its ally is hit, inflict 1 [MiddleFingerBook] against the attacker, then gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn (max 5 per turn)
- When an allied unit from The Middle is killed by a Skill, inflict 2 additional [MiddleFingerBook] against the attacker

dataList.name: Wounded in Battle
dataList.desc: Begins Encounter with 40% less HP (including Parts)

dataList.name: Brush it Off
dataList.desc: When in panic, recover from panic at the start of the next turn and reset SP to 0.
